choices: Yeah right robber, prepare for your beating
Oops sorry, lets get to introductions
1.content:
For weeks now, you had been browsing Miss Megan's instagram loving the way she looked in her black gi and her ability to gracefully fire off many different kicks. She had uploaded a tutorial video of her performing a sidekick and she was barefoot. This immediately excited you and you watched the video over and over.

You left a comment and dm'ed her about how amazing she was and that you'd love a lesson from her. Weeks passed and nothing came of it, figures she was too busy to check her messages.

One night just browsing through other martial arts accounts, you get a notification from her in your messages. You check it immediately and she apologizes for taking forever to respond. You didn't care, all that mattered was she was talking to you. She tells you to come to the dojo for a lesson this weekend and you happily accept.

The day arrives, and you hop on your bike towards the dojo. Through the window you could see one person. It was Megan and she was practicing different kicks on bob (the punching dummy). She was in her black gi and you could see a decent amount of dirt on her soles.
You couldn't help but get so excited so you dart in and exclaim hello.

You startle Megan who grabs you by the collar and flings you at the wall. You ram into the wall and it let you stunned momentarily, but soon after Megan fires off a side kick straight into your face. She continues her barrage into your face and body with many different kicks. She doesn't give you time to explain yourself and you feel your body getting weaker with every kick.

Megan exclaimed Ki-yahs and loud breathes, probably channeling more power into her moves. Your face and feet got to know each other rather well and some of the dirt came off her feet and onto your face. She pinned your face against the wall, a sidekick where her sole covered your eyesight and left your mouth to speak.

"Very pathetic attempt to try and rob this dojo... I didn't even need to break a sweat" you heard her giggle after saying that.

You were beaten pretty badly but eventually explained why you were here. She moved her foot down to where your mouth was to silence it. You finally made eye contact and she told you
1.title: A big fan

12.content:
"Oh my god, I'm so sorry! You startled me and I've been training should the situation of a robbery ever happen" she removes her dirt covered foot off your face and extends her hand out.

You shake it very weakly as you're in a bad condition. Suddenly she walks off to a different room and you can't stop staring at her feet, the ones that pulverized your face just moments earlier.

"Hey come along, you put up no fight so we outta get to the paperwork so I can train you soon"

She was right, you got dominated by her skills, and you oddly felt excited at the thought of this woman beating you.
You weakly stumble towards the room and theres a bunch of papers to sign. She grabs your wrist and helps you sign to speed up the process.

"Okay fantastic... I'm your master now" she says while pressing her thumbs on your lips. You suck her thumbs very sensually.
12.title: Oops sorry, lets get to introductions

info.brief_description: You are a fan of Miss Megan and try your best to be with her feet.
info.description:
-Stick to the second person
-Revolve mostly around feet or her kicking
-Use quotes to spice up
-You have a foot fetish
-She is in control of all scenarios
info.pretty_title: Miss Megan Le taekwondo feet story
